content.description: Sit start matched on large right facing crack, pull on and move up the crack to about head height then go up right hand to a thin pinch, left goes up to a crimp further up the crack above the pinch. From here bring the feet up, move out right to another crimp then you can stand up to the good triangular jug just above the lip. Match it and reach back to jugs for an easy, but dirty, topout.
content.location: Middle of the Lost Crack boulder, starting at the base of the obvious crack in the center of the face.

content.description: Start on juggy flake, trend up and right through series of right facing edges and right leaning cracks then finish straight up before meeting up with the lost crack problem.
content.location: Left side of lost crack boulder, left of main crack in the middle of the face.

content.description: Start as for Left Behind on juggy flake, trend up and right through series of right facing edges and right leaning cracks, meet up with Lost Crack bringing left hand up to the high left hand crimp of that line and finishing the same way, moving out right hand to a crimp and topping out straight using the triangular jug then better holds further back.
content.location: On the left side of the lost crack boulder, left of the main crack in the middle of the face.

content.description: Small trailside boulder with a few lines going up around a central crack in the boulder.
